Aug. 25, 2019 D New South Wales Junior B Grade Concert Band State Championships
New South Wales Junior B Grade Concert Band State Championships 5 Test Piece Contest NSW State Band Championships (Wind Band Sections) new-south-wales-junior-b-grade-concert-b-6097
None
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Choice between different Test Pieces (see below Results)
Joan Sutherland Performing Arts Centre (Richard Bonynge Concert Hall), Penrith, New South Wales, Australia TEST SELECTION Bands had the option to select for their Test piece from a nominated list of 7. Used Pieces: a) The Stone Guest (Brian Hogg) (b) Chorale & Shaker Dance (John Zdechlik) (c) Art in the Park (Robert Sheldon)
Aug. 30, 2019, 3:51 a.m. June 10, 2020, 9:28 a.m.
1 Knox Grammar School Symphonic Wind Ensemble (NSW) James Brice Lexicon of the Gods
2 Arden Anglican School Concert (Epping) Mathew Gately Spirit of the Sequoia
3 Turramurra High School Concert Band No.2 Jeffrey Barnsley (a) Cool (b) Pictures at an Exhibition (c) Chorale from 'Concord' (d) Fanfare for Justice
Withdrawn Kings School Symphonic Band Unknown
